Title: Orchard-Supplied Hardware
Description:
They may not be weaponmasters, but many of these farmers can wield a simple hoe or a rake as an extension of their own will.

That mastery coupled with the right motivation could muster a force capable of standing against the mogu.

If you can bring back some tools from the orchard, I'll distribute them to anyone willing to fight.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve 6 Orchard Tools from Nectarbreeze Orchard.
RewardText: There are no $cs among us, but we'll fight to protect our loved ones.
